comment._content:
I'm free!  There's nothing better than this for having fun on the beach!  Stockings soaked in cold seawater is just the best sensation ever!

OMG! Such fun! Can't wait for the sandcastle competition. I'll slay em!

comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Bokeh Focus (Kissed By Light) , and we'd love to have this added to the group! This a Beautiful Capture! The Light, Focus and Details are amazing! Please share this beautiful image with us in Bokeh Focus (Kissed By Light)! Bokeh Focus (Kissed By Light)

comment.author: 12946995@N03
comment._content:
love the composition (3 people in diagonal row deep into the space; 2 people under her armpits, electric things left and right above her head and more). love the crop (feet cut of). 

-> induces attention, tension and dizzyness. the boy in the center seems to be the only one standing straight, although he is not, of course. very vertigo.

the picture induces many many associations. maybe i did not sleep enough ;-)

comment.author: 51124332@N03
comment._content: Love it! Reminds of the summers I spent in Atlantic City hotels near the beach in the 80's as a kid. Love the arrangement of the people in the background in relation to the primary subject as well. Great shot all around.

comment._content: Currently using this for my history of photography essay assignment. I cannot stop staring at this. :)
